name: Marla's Balloon (hstott)
description:
Our world has been devoured by the glass. Without the help of Gramps' ghost, staying safe is a mighty task...

CONTROLS

A and D to move left and right.

Space to jump.

W to ghost rise.

S to lower balloon.

CREDITS

Gameplay Music by Spectator

Voices by Harvey Jefferies

A Game by Harry Stott
